resources.string: How to play: Select or enter the correct answer(s) for each question and then click the Check Answers button to get your score!
1. What 2007 Pixar film starred a rodent and was set in France?
2. Sigourney Weaver returned as Ripley in what 1986 action film set on LV-426 and directed by James Cameron?
3. What 1963 film starring Elizabeth Taylor was once one of the most expensive films ever made and actually won Taylor a Guinness Record for excessive costume changes?
4. \"Who ya gonna call?\" This line from the theme song of a popular 1984 sci-fi/comedy would ultimately be followed by what answer?
5. ________ starred in the 1976 film based on Stephen King\'s first novel called ________?
